slides.content: Green Valley International is undoubtedly the best School in NY for it's commitment and responsibility towards students. The teachers are well qualified and helpful.
slides.name: Sophia Miller
slides.title: Chief Editor, Monday Times

slides.content: What I am today is because of the Green Valley International School. The teachers are very helpful and committed towards students. The level of education is truly commendable.
slides.name: Michael Morris
slides.title: Mechanical Engineer, Alumni 2015

slides.content: Green Valley is by far, and undoubtedly one of the best schools of NY. The academy has a long history of delivering successful citizens since 1982.
slides.name: Daisy Perez
slides.title: Interior Designer, Colors LLC.
